programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Karate Chops / Taco The Town - Used to being top dog, Carl can't handle when Adelaide joins his karate class and becomes the star student. // Hector starts selling Rosa's delicious tacos but gets overwhelmed when they're more popular than the mercado!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Chancla Force / Fluff Love - Carl takes Rosa's chancla, setting off the balance of order in the city, & calling the Chancla Force into action! // Carlitos goes on a wild adventure to get his favorite stuffed animal from the arcade.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep273
programme.desc: Potato Puff / There Will Be Grease! - Mrs. Puff's new substitute teacher gives SpongeBob a crash course in driving. // Mr. Krabs and Plankton must work together after discovering a well of miracle-grease under their restaurants.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep274
programme.desc: Big Bad Bubble Bass / Sea-Man Sponge Haters Club - Karen tells the fairytale of a nerd trying to steal an action figure from his three little neighbors. // Squidward hosts a secret "We Hate SpongeBob Club" at his house.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep275
programme.desc: Food PBBFT! Truck / Upturn Girls - SpongeBob and Squidward try to sell krabby patties from a food truck in the darkest depths of the ocean. // Pearl and Narlene have a whales' day out in the big city.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep276
programme.desc: Say 'Awww!'/ Patrick the Mailman - Frustrated that he's seen as cute instead of evil, Plankton builds a robot to punish anyone who says "aww!" // Patrick crushes the mailman, so he and SpongeBob deliver the mail around Bikini Bottom.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep262
programme.desc: A Cabin in the Kelp / The Hankering - The Gal Pals take Pearl to a cabin in the woods for a weekend of silly pranks. // Mr. Krabs has a secret taste for something surprising.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep158
programme.desc: Sweet and Sour Squidward - Plankton tries to befriend Squidward in an effort to steal the Krabby Patty formula.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Royal Pain - Po takes on the challenge of training a lovable but klutzy member of the Emperor's family. However, will Po's training be enough to protect them both from the evil designs of a traitor in their midst?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Bosom Enemies - After dealing Taotie yet another humiliating defeat, Po is horrified to learn that the villainous warthog has had a full on nervous breakdown. Po is determined to heal his spirit and Taotie is eager to change his evil ways...or is he?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Secret Admirer - When Po's fake love letter prank on Monkey backfires, the duo's relationship is put to the test in a story of jealousy, betrayal and, yes, even kidnapping.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Marble Jar Head - How in the world is Rico supposed to behave well when King Julien has kidnapped his doll, Miss Perky?

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Littlefoot / Smotherly Love - Marlene is dying to go see a concert in the park. But, every time she leaves the zoo she becomes a feral monster! // Ma, an empty-nested mother possum, takes up residence in the Penguins Lair after they destroy her home.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep302
programme.desc: A Kipper for Skipper / High Moltage - Its off to the races when Skipper agrees to give a day off from hard training to the first penguin who can bring him a kipper. // The penguins are determined to make opening day of their favorite action stars blockbuster movie!

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep218
programme.desc: The Earth King - The kids battle Long Feng the Dai Li when they attempt to show the Earth King the vast conspiracy taking place in his city. Zuko becomes seriously ill and has feverish dreams as he faces a spiritual crisis.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep219
programme.desc: The Guru - Aang starts to learn control of the Avatar State from Guru Pathik at the Eastern Air Temple. Sokka is reunited with his father.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep220
programme.desc: The Crossroads of Destiny - When Aang has a vision that Katara is in danger, Aang, Sokka, and Toph all rush back to Ba Sing Se to save her. They meet up with Iroh, who asks their help in saving Zuko who had been captured as well.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Donut Disturb / The Cursed Amulet - Bester unwittingly uncovers the not so delicious goings on in Fritz Fritter's top secret Donut Wonderland Factory. // Best and Bester dig up Captain Ironfoot's Cursed Amulet on the beach only to find that Deep Sea Belle wants it too.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep118
programme.desc: That's So Cupid / Buddy Odour - Inspired by the latest Romcom release at the Movie Theatre, Best and Bester decide to go on a match-making mission. // Toot moves into the Sub with Best and Bester, but they find there's no getting away from her smell - literally!

programme.title: Planet Sheen S01 Ep112
programme.desc: To Chill A Mocking Blurg / Now You Sheen It - The Emperor's Royal Ball of Compliments turns into a Hall of Insults. // Sheen puts on a magic show that actually makes people disappear.

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Bumblebee Magnetic Karaoke Hippo / Time Out - Felicity helps a mashup creature to realize his true potential. // To avoid a visit to Dr. Lotzashots, Felicity borrows Father Time's watch.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Snappy Campers / Lucky Duck - Dudley and Kitty go undercover as campers at Camp Itchyowiebooboo to empede Snaptrap's "evil" plan. // Dudley's favorite TV host attempts to destroy television to avenge the cancellation of his show.

programme.title: Top Wing S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Banana Bandits / Shirley's Rocket Adventure - Monkey bandits hijack Rhonda's bananas! The Cadets rescue the bananas and Turtle Train when the monkeys strike again. // Shirley accidently turbo-charges her little plane. It takes all of Swift's flying skills to rescue her.

programme.title: Top Wing S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Top Wing's Eggcellent Rescue / The Great Pearl-A-Palooza Caper - Sandy Stork loses her glasses and mixes up the eggs in her delivery. Top Wing race to get the right eggs back home before they hatch! // When Chomps and Rocco take Big Swirl's famous pearls, Top Wing must get them back in time for Pearl-A-Palooza!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep90
programme.desc: A Flea In Her Dome / Donut Of Shame / The Krusty Plate - SpongeBob and Patrick try to help Sandy rid her Tree Dome of fleas. // When Patrick accidentally takes SpongeBobs donut he is wracked with guilt over his crime. // SpongeBob battles a persistent speck of food that is on a plate.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep91
programme.desc: Goo Goo Gas / Le Big Switch - Plankton creates a gas that turns everyone at the Krusty Krab into babies. // After being enrolled in a chef exchange program, SpongeBob switches places with a snooty French chef from a high-end restaurant.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep93
programme.desc: Picture Day / Pat No Pay / Blackjack - It's Picture Day for the Boating School Year Book. // When Patrick eats his weight in Krabby Patties without paying, Mr. Krabs puts him to work in the restaurant. // SpongeBob's parents are missing.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep94
programme.desc: Blackened Sponge / Mermaid Man vs. Sponge - SpongeBob accidentally punches himself in the face leaving behind a hideous black eye, but is too embarrassed to tell anyone the truth. // Plankton has brainwashed Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep95
programme.desc: The Inmates of Summer / To Save a Squirrel - Instead of getting on the ship headed for summer camp, SpongeBob and Patrick accidentally board a ship full of prisoners on their way to jail on Inferno Island. // SpongeBob and Pat stow away on one of Sandys wilderness adventure.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep96
programme.desc: The Pest of the West - While researching his family tree SpongeBob discovers that he was related to the great Western hero, and famous chili-slinger, SpongeBuck.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Squashed - When Alvin dreams of joining a private club, he volunteers Dave to play squash, even though Dave doesn't play.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Writer's Block - When Dave suffers from writer's block, Alvin pretends to write a broadway show, which only makes Dave feel worse.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC295ProchazkavsPereira
programme.desc: UFC celebrates its 30th Anniversary at Madison Square Garden with an epic championship doubleheader. Former light heavyweight champion Jiri Prochazka battles former middleweight champ Alex Pereira for the vacant light heavyweight crown, plus Sergei Pavlovich and Tom Aspinall face off for the interim heavyweight title. All this and much more on UFC Reloaded

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep3
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep2
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.desc: Ultimate Knockouts "Welterweights - UFC Ultimate Knockouts brings you a collection of the best welterweight KOs.

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC288SterlingvsCejudo
programme.desc: At UFC 288, Aljamain Funkmaster Sterling defended his bantamweight belt from one of the greatest combat athletes of all time, Henry Triple C Cejudo. See both men train and prepare for their title tilt on UFC Main Event.

programme.title: MotoGP : MotoGP : Red Bull Grand Prix of The Americas Highlights
programme.desc: MotoGP : MotoGP : Red Bull Grand Prix of The Americas Highlights - The Circuit Of The Americas is the first purpose-built Grand Prix facility in the U.S. near Austin, Texas, with a 5.513km track and a capacity for 120,000 fans. Construction of the impressive 1000-acre facility was completed late in 2012, with MotoGP lining up at the track for the first time in 2013. One of its more distinctive features is near 41m-elevation change with an impressive incline at the end of the home-straight followed by a sharp left. The circuit is one of the most varied on the GP circuit, with a mix of fast straights and tight hairpins, with most sections mirroring at least some part of a famous track around the world.

programme.title: UFC 300: Pereira vs. Hill
programme.desc: Prelims - Over 30 years in the making, UFC 300 is finally here on April 14, complete with three title fights and a card stacked from top to bottom with mixed martial arts biggest stars. In the main event at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas, Jamahal Hill attempts to regain the title he never lost in the Octagon when he meets light heavyweight king Alex Pereira. Plus, an all-China showdown pits strawweight champion Zhang Weili against top contenderYan Xiaonan, and the BMF title is on the line when Justin Gaethje faces off with Max Holloway

programme.title: UFC 300: Pereira vs. Hill

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC296EdwardsvsCovington
